account_registered_as_a_proxy_is_not_all: This account is currently registered as a proxy, and cannot set another proxy without first unregistering as a proxy. To unregister this account, use the Register Voting Proxy tab on the Tools page.
account_that_uses_a_proxy_is_not_allowed: This account currently has set it's votes to another proxy, and cannot itself register as a proxy. To remove the set proxy, click the Change Voter Proxy button on the Producer Voting page.
cannot_undelegate_bandwidth_until_the_ch: This blockchain has yet to have 15 percent of it's tokens staked and therefore unstaking is currently disabled. Once that percentage is reached, you will be able to unstake your tokens.
error_accountName_not_unique_in_contacts: This account name is already in your list of contacts.
error_account_does_not_exist: This account name does not exist.
error_account_does_not_exist_on_chain: The {{account}} account does not seem to exist on the specified blockchain.
error_bid_is_too_low: Bid must be 10 percent higher than the current highest bid.
error_cannot_transfer_to_self: Invalid recipient, cannot transfer funds to self.
error_eosio_assert_message_exception: The Blockchain returned a generic error based on your request. Please check that the information is valid and try again.
error_insufficient_balance: Insufficient available balance to complete transaction.
error_insufficient_balance_matured: Insufficient available matured balance to complete transaction. REX balances must mature for ~4 days before transactions may be created to sell.
error_invalid_accountName: 인식 불가능한 계정 이름, 1~12 글자로 구성되었는지 확인하세요.
error_invalid_activeKeyValue: Invalid Active Key, make sure it starts with '{{chainSymbol}}' and has an additional 50 characters.
error_invalid_background: Invalid Background value, must be less than 256 Bytes.
error_invalid_characters: Invalid name, should not include any special characters.
error_invalid_delegatedBw: 인식 불가능한 위임된 대역폭 액수입니다. 예: '12. 121'.
error_invalid_logo_256: Invalid Logo url, must begin with 'http://' or 'https://'.
error_invalid_memo: Invalid Memo, must not contain any private keys and must be less than 256 Bytes.
error_invalid_name: Invalid Name value, must be less than 256 Bytes.
error_invalid_ownerKey: 인식 불가능한 Owner Key, 'EOS'로 시작하고 53 자로 구성되어야합니다.
error_invalid_ownerKeyValue: Invalid Owner Key, make sure it starts with '{{chainSymbol}}' and has an additional 50 characters.
error_invalid_philosophy: Invalid Philosophy value, must be less than 256 Bytes.
error_invalid_ramAmount: 인식 불가능한 RAM 금액, 유효 금액은 십진수가없는 정수 여야합니다 예: '1200'.
error_invalid_slogan: Invalid Slogan, must be less than 256 Bytes.
error_invalid_steemit: Invalid Steemit username, must be less than 256 Bytes.
error_invalid_telegram: Invalid Telegram group, must be less than 256 Bytes.
error_invalid_website: Invalid website, must start with 'http://' or 'https://'.
error_invalid_wechat: Invalid Wechat username, must be less than 256 Bytes.
error_newname_already_bid: You already bid on this name.
error_newname_not_available: This account name is already taken.
error_newname_too_long: Can only bid on an account name of 11 characters or less.
error_no_stake_left: 스테이크 된 금액을 0으로 설정할 수 없습니다. 이렇게하면 네트워크에서 거래를 중단 될 수 있습니다.
error_not_enough_delegated_bw_for_new_ac: 일부 대역폭 리소스를 새 계정에 위임해야합니다.
error_not_enough_delegated_cpu_for_new_a: 일부 CPU 리소스를 새 계정에 위임해야합니다.
error_not_valid_stake_amount: 유효한 스테이크 수량이 아닙니다 (최대 소수점 이하 4자리 허용, 예시: 12.1212).
error_ram_has_to_be_over_minimum_amount: 거래 당 최소 3 바이트의 RAM이 필요합니다.
error_ram_has_to_be_over_minimum_amount_: A minimum of 1024 bytes of RAM is required per transaction.
error_ram_not_valid_amount: 인식 불가능한 RAM 용량, 유효 용량은 십진수가없는 정수 여야합니다.
error_ram_under_minimum_for_new_account: 새 계정을 만들려면 최소 4000 바이트의 RAM이 필요합니다.
error_ram_under_minimum_of_2600_for_new_: A minimum of 2600 Bytes of RAM is required to create a new account.
error_ram_usage_exceeded: RAM 사용량이 초과되었습니다. 이 작업을 수행하려면 더 많은 RAM 을 구입하세요.
error_requested_actor_missing: The account that was requested to sign this transaction is currently not loaded in this wallet.
error_transferring_to_exchange_without_m: Cannot transfer funds to an exchange without passing the memo that was given.
error_wallet_already_exists: The wallet already exists on the selected chain.
error_withdraw_account_validation_failed: Unexpected error. Cannot validate withdraw account.
global_account_key_modal_subheader: Unlock, show, and export the private key for this public key.
global_account_key_remove_unable: A key cannot be deleted while one or more accounts are using it. Please remove the accounts using this key from your wallet first.
global_account_key_remove_confirm_desc: This action will delete the selected public and private key from Anchor. You will not be able to recover this key. Please ensure if you need this key in the future you have it backed up safely in another place.
global_account_key_remove_confirm_header: Are you sure you want to delete this key?
global_account_edit_modal_subheader: The internal details used in this application for this Wallet/Account.
global_account_import_existing_accounts: Accounts found using existing key pairs.
global_account_import_existing_descripti: Using the existing key pairs saved within Anchor, we will automatically attempt to find all accounts that you have access to for this blockchain. Add additional private keys to find more accounts.
global_account_import_ledger_account_loo: Loading all accounts that match the Public Key provided by the Ledger
global_account_import_ledger_communicati: Retrieving Public Key based on the index provided from the Ledger device.
global_account_import_ledger_description: Import an account that has already been converted to use a Ledger device.
global_account_import_manual_warning_con: This method of importing does no validation of the information you provide. If you input any of the information incorrectly, the account will not work and will display authority errors. Use the 'Import Private Key' option to ensure the account is setup correctly.
global_account_import_manual_account_aut: Import an account configured with authorities allowing it to be controlled from another account.
global_account_import_manual_account_key: Import an account configured with authorities allowing it to be controlled by a private key.
global_account_import_manual_subheader_o: Manually enter all account details to import an account.
global_account_import_ledger_not_connect: The Ledger device must be connected and ready before continuing. Click the USB icon in the upper right menu to connect your device.
global_account_import_ledger_select_desc: Select the accounts to import from the list below.
global_account_import_private_cold_walle: Any wallet created in this mode will only be able sign 'Unsigned Transaction' files saved using a 'Watch Wallet' on a separate computer. Since this mode of operation is entirely offline, it does not validate any of the information about the account(s) you setup. Please ensure it is the correct information or transaction signing will fail.
A wallet designed to work on an offline computer acting as a cold storage device.
global_account_import_private_descriptio: 추가 계정을 가져오려면 개인 키를 입력하기 만하면 됩니다. 이 프로그램이 공개 키로 변환하고 관련된 계정을 조회합니다.
global_account_import_private_key: 개인 키 (51 자 와 숫자 5로 시작)
global_account_import_private_requires_h: Please enter a password of your choosing and keep it safe. This password cannot be recovered and is not stored anywhere within the app.

Before you can import a private key, the application needs to establish a password for encryption. Please set a password to enabling importing private keys and remember it, it will not be stored and cannot be recovered or changed.
Before storing any sensitive information, like private keys, first you will need to setup a password for use within your Anchor wallet.
이 작업에는 기존의 라이트 지갑이 필요합니다.
가져오기를 수행하기 전에 기존 라이트 지갑으로 전환하여 계속 진행하세요. 관찰지갑 모드에서만 사용 중에 라이트 지갑 기능을 사용하려면, 먼저 재설정하고 라이트 지갑을 가져오세오.
global_account_import_private_swap_first: This is the first time this wallet has attempted to import a Hot wallet from a Watch wallet. Before proceeding, switch to one of the existing hot wallets, then import the new account.
global_account_import_select_accounts: 이 개인 키를 사용하여 가져올 하나 이상의 계정을 선택 하세요.
global_account_import_watch_description: 계정을 관찰지갑으로 가져 오기. 관찰지갑은 계정을 모니터링하고 서명되지 않은 거래를 생성할 수 있습니다.
global_account_select_blockchain_default: Select a blockchain to suggest a default server...
global_account_select_wallet: Network Changed - Select a wallet to continue.
global_account_select_wallet_no_wallets: No accounts loaded for the {{name}} blockchain.
global_accounts_dropdown_no_accounts: 추가 지갑이 생성되지 않았습니다. 시작하려면 '도구' 로 이동 한 다음 '지갑 관리' 로 이동하세요.
global_app_requires_upgrade_subheader: Choose to either Upgrade, View the Update Details, or Skip this Update.
global_button_account_import_required_ca: To exit cold wallet mode, reset the application through the Tools interface.
global_button_elevate_failure_header: 입력한 암호가 현재 선택된 지갑의 암호와 일치하지 않습니다.
global_button_elevate_modal_description: Enter your Anchor password to continue
global_dangerlink_warning_body_1: Anchor can not vouch for the safety of the website you are about to visit. Please be dilligent with the security of your keys and account information, only sharing information when you are absolutely sure it can be trusted.
global_dangerlink_warning_body_3: 계속 진행하시려면 아래의 확인 버튼을 누르십시오..
global_modal_settings_customtoken_descri: 추적할 사용자 지정한 토큰 계약의 계정을 입력하세요.
global_modal_settings_customtoken_header: 추적 할 사용자 지정 토큰 추가
global_modal_settings_customtoken_none_t: 추적할 사용자 지정 토큰 계정이 없습니다.
global_modal_settings_customtoken_notfou: 토큰에 대한 세부 정보를 찾을 수 없습니다.
global_settings_transaction_fees_on: Automatically display request with transaction fee applied.
global_settings_transaction_fees_off: Show the resource warning with an option to apply the fee.
global_settings_disable_signingrequests: Do not allow any signing requests
global_settings_filter_spam_transfers_0_: Filter out transfers with a 0.0001 amount
Filter out transfers with an amount under 0.0010
Filter out transfers with an amount under 0.0100
Filter out transfers with an amount under 0.1000
global_settings_filter_spam_transfers_do: Do not filter out spam transfers
global_settings_idle_timeout_fifteen_min: Automatically lock wallet after 15 minutes of inactivity
global_settings_idle_timeout_five_minute: Automatically lock wallet after 5 minutes of inactivity
global_settings_idle_timeout_sixty_minut: Automatically lock wallet after 60 minutes of inactivity
global_settings_idle_timeout_thirty_minu: Automatically lock wallet after 30 minutes of inactivity
global_settings_show_testnets: Enable support and show known Testnets.
global_settings_skip_link_modal_do_not_s: Display warnings when links are clicked
global_settings_skip_link_modal_skip: Never display warnings when links are clicked
global_transaction_actions_details_conte: 이 거래 내의 각 작업은 다음과 같습니다.
global_transaction_complete_warning_mess: 제출된 모든 거래의 승인을 보장할 수는 없습니다. 네트워크 내에서 거래가 완료되었는지 확인하시려면 블록 탐색기에서 위의 거래 ID를 검색하여 최근 비가역 블록에 입력되었는지 확인하십시오.
global_transaction_full_details_content: 이 거래의 전체 데이터는 다음과 같습니다.
global_transaction_hardware_ledger_await: Use the device itself to confirm the details of the transaction.
global_transaction_message_error_authori: The 'owner' private key is currently imported, which currently can only be used to issue the 'updateauth' command.
The authorizations of this account no longer matches the key currently imported.
The current private key has insufficient permissions to execute the selected action.
The private key can be changed by either removing the currently wallet and reimporting the private key, or by completely resetting the wallet and rerunning the import process.
The private key used in this wallet cannot perform the selected action.
global_transaction_unsigned_message: 서명되지 않은 거래가 관찰지갑에 생성되었습니다. 아래 버튼을 클릭하여 파일로 저장하신 후 콜드지갑에 서명 할 수 있슴니다.
global_transaction_unsigned_message_r2: An unsigned transaction has been created by this watch-mode wallet. Please sign this transaction with a compatible wallet to proceed.
global_transaction_unsigned_warning_mess: 각 거래는 생성 후 1 시간 이내에 서명하고 방송(브로드캐스트) 해야합니다.
global_keys_subheader_one: Generate private keys locally using eosjs + Anchor, then encrypt and save them using your password.
global_keys_header_two: Import keys from a Ledger device
global_keys_subheader_two: Anchor will import the public keys from your Ledger device and then use the device for signing.
global_keys_message_content: Use the tools below to establish a key pair within Anchor before continuing.
invalid_proxy_specified: The proxy account that was specified does not exist. If it is a valid account make sure that it has registered as a proxy voter.
global_blockchain_choose_subheader: Select a blockchain to get started with. You will be able to add more later.
global_blockchain_enable_header: Which blockchains do you plan on using?
global_blockchain_enable_subheader: You can add/remove blockchains at any point in the future.
global_blockchain_manage_subheader: You can easily switch between blockchains using the dropdown menu in the upper left menu.
global_blockchain_manage_card_two_descri: Manage which blockchains Anchor is configured to interact with.
global_import_index_header_one: Setup a wallet to use the {{connectionChain}} blockchain.
global_import_index_subheader_one: In order to interact with the blockchain, a wallet needs to be configured for each account.
global_import_contract_subheader_one: If you have ${connection.chain} already, you can transfer a small amount to a smart contract to have an account created.
global_import_create_subheader_one: If you have tokens already, you can transfer a small amount to a special smart contract and an account will be created.
global_import_create_subheader_two: Generate a unique URL which you can share with either an existing user or an account creation service to have a new account created.
global_account_import_detect_header_two: Failed to locate any additional accounts
global_account_import_detect_subheader_t: All accounts for this blockchain that match your existing key pairs have already been imported. Import a new private key to detect new accounts.
global_account_import_exist_subheader_on: Anchor will encrypt your private key locally and then find the {{connectionChain}} accounts matching the public key.
global_account_import_exist_header_two: Import an existing Account using a Ledger device
global_account_import_exist_subheader_tw: Anchor will load the public key from your Ledger and then find the {{connection.chain}} accounts it matches.
global_account_import_exist_header_three: Import an existing account as a Watch Wallet
global_account_import_exist_header_four: A watch wallet is a read-only wallet and doesn't require any key pairs. It can be used with a cold wallet setup for secure signing.
global_account_import_exist_subheader_fi: For advanced use cases: input all account details by hand to connect with an account.
global_account_import_hot_subheader_one: Anchor will encrypt your private key locally and then find the {{connectionChain}} accounts matching the public key.
global_account_import_password_subheader: Ensure you keep a copy of your password safely offline. This password cannot be recovered, and without this password, any private keys stored within Anchor cannot be decrypted.
global_account_import_private_paragraph: Ensure you keep a copy of both your password and your keys safely offline. This password cannot be recovered.
global_account_import_request_header_one: Create an account using an Account Creation Request
global_account_import_request_subheader_: Generate a request URL and share it with someone willing to create an account for you.
A request to create your account can be found below.
global_account_import_watch_paragraph: Select which account and permission type to watch.
global_account_import_welcome_header_one: Scan for accounts on this blockchain
global_account_import_welcome_subheader_: Anchor will automatically query the {{connectionChain}} blockchains for accounts matching your known public keys.
global_account_import_welcome_paragraph: Scanning will be enabled after one key pair is saved.
global_account_import_welcome_subheader_: Configure Anchor to use existing accounts on this blockchain.
Set up a new account for the selected blockchain.
global_blockchain_manage_resync_paragrap: This utility will fetch a more recent copy of available blockchains and update their configuration.

Anchor will do this by fetching data from the "anchorwallet" smart contract on the Blockchain. It will fetch this data either from the custom EOS node you have specified or by accessing the public API at eos.greymass.com directly.
global_message_error_header: An error occured while loading the app:
